_header: This is John Hancock is book
Subjects: bookplates; Hancock, John, book owner; hell
_description: Book plate consigning Thomas Carter to hell — one couplet

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Thys ys John hancok ys boke hoso euer saye nayethe deuyll of hell
                    bere Thomas carter awaye
DULCosViii9.Note: Immediately followed by 3010 as if part of same work.
